availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: E. B. Bacheler (Rockcastle County, Kentucky, politician and attorney)

body.p: Rockcastle County, Kentucky, politician and attorney. Maine native. Clerk in Newton, Massachusetts, in 1850. Attorney in London, Kentucky, in 1860. Member of the House of Representatives of the Kentucky General Assembly from Rockcastle County from 1861 to 1863.

ab.bibl: Lewis Collins and Richard H. Collins, Collins' Historical Sketches of Kentucky, vol. 2 (Covington, KY: Collins & Co., 1874), p. 690-691. Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Massachusetts, Middlesex County, Newton, p. 3. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Laurel County, London, p. 135.
